overview: Mr. Bachar is a project manager and R&D engineer with experience in product development through all stages from conceptual through detailed design to final production. He is the founder of Ymedical (Medical Device Engineering Solutions) and has been a Project Manager at SagaX Medical Technologies Ltd., Fertiligent Ltd., Remon Medical Technologies Ltd. and serve as advisor of Clalit Health Services. Previously he was a Project Manager and R&D Engineer at Elad Engineering Ltd. He is the head of the Biomedical Engineering forum at Tel-Aviv University.
